$interpreted: Male Civilian: Thank goodness, princess Angelia has finally returned! We have waited too long for this day!
Female Civilian: We can finally escape the days where saying the wrong things get you arrested. The brutal tax rates are finally gone too...
Female Civilian: All hail princess Angelia!
Angelia: Is that so...didn't expect it to be Hyde...good thing that you guys only suffered minor injuries.
Leah: Yeah, Tica immediately went back to the Academy after just a night of rest. She was so energtic~
Lio: But...besides Sir Hyde...we've got to learn more about those people in purple robes.
Leah: Ah, right! They seemed like serious trouble!
Angelia: Understood. I'll investigate further.
Angelia: You all worked hard. We will have a banquet later. Please, try to have fun and enjoy yourselves.
Leah: Yippee~ It's rare that I get to eat such expensive meals~ I'm definitely going to stuff myself full before I go back to the Academy!
Lio: Big sis, so you're going back?
Leah: Of course. I just took some time off from my studies at Rune Academy. I have to go back soon since I need to catch up with the courses!
Lio: But...we finally met each other again...
Leah: Hey! If you're a man, don't cry!
Leah: Besides, you still have princess Angelia as your friend, don't you~?
Leah: With her taking care of you, I can take my lessons without having to worry about you. You want your big sis to become a great rune sorcerer too, right?

Angelia: Please rest assured. We will take good care of Lio. 
I promise he won't feel lonely.
Leah: Thank you, princess. We shall take our leave.
Leah: Hehe~ You sure did find yourself a reliable backer when I wasn't around. Looks like big sis'll have no problem with her future career~
Fredrica: Princess, the nobles have all lined up and are prepared to greet you. It's about time we start moving.
Angelia: They are all here already!? That was fast!
Fredrica: That's just how these nobles function. They just go with the flow and obey whoever is in power.
Fredrica: You'll get used to it.
Naya: Fredrica! Why are you here?
Fredrica: Aww, come on~ It's just a new employer. It's not like I resigned or anything. Of course I'm staying~
Angelia: During the civil war, everybody was just following orders. As long as they pledge loyalty now, I won't hold them responsible.
Fredrica: That's pretty much the case~
Fredrica: Princess, I'll go address the nobles first. Don't take too long~
Naya: Angel, dear Sione and Chieftain Crushfang have both returned safely. It seems that the Twelve Nobles have decided to not pursue their crimes.
Angelia: ...I see, thank goodness...
Naya: As with Elio and Theodore...we haven't received any updates so far...
Angelia: ... Naya, do you remember the time you said that you feel like I am a changed person?
Naya: ... I thought you'd reached a point where what I said didn't mean much to you anymore.
Angelia: ... I want to tell you a secret...
Angelia: That day, in the desert, there was this voice in my head...
Angelia: It told me to order you to shoot the arrow. It didn't matter if you had killed Elio; I had to get rid of Theodore, once and for all...
Angelia: In the end, I was able to suppress that voice, I was terrified. I would never even consider something like that in the past...
Angelia: It seems like there's a part of me that I'm gradually not able to recognize...
Angelia: To be honest...I was originally a bit mad at you too...I was mad that even you misunderstood me.
Angelia: But now...I think that you might be right.
Naya: ...Angel...
Angelia: I'm so scared. Naya, what...what should I do?

Model.Text: Thank goodness, princess Angelia has finally returned! We have waited too long for this day!
We can finally escape the days where saying the wrong things get you arrested. The brutal tax rates are finally gone too...
All hail princess Angelia!
Is that so...didn't expect it to be Hyde...good thing that you guys only suffered minor injuries.
Yeah, Tica immediately went back to the Academy after just a night of rest. She was so energtic~
But...besides Sir Hyde...we've got to learn more about those people in purple robes.
Ah, right! They seemed like serious trouble!
Understood. I'll investigate further.
You all worked hard. We will have a banquet later. Please, try to have fun and enjoy yourselves.
Yippee~ It's rare that I get to eat such expensive meals~ I'm definitely going to stuff myself full before I go back to the Academy!

But...we finally met each other again...
Hey! If you're a man, don't cry!
Besides, you still have princess Angelia as your friend, don't you~?
With her taking care of you, I can take my lessons without having to worry about you. You want your big sis to become a great rune sorcerer too, right?

Please rest assured. We will take good care of Lio. 
I promise he won't feel lonely.
Thank you, princess. We shall take our leave.
Hehe~ You sure did find yourself a reliable backer when I wasn't around. Looks like big sis'll have no problem with her future career~
Princess, the nobles have all lined up and are prepared to greet you. It's about time we start moving.
They are all here already!? That was fast!
That's just how these nobles function. They just go with the flow and obey whoever is in power.
You'll get used to it.

That's pretty much the case~
Princess, I'll go address the nobles first. Don't take too long~
Angel, dear Sione and Chieftain Crushfang have both returned safely. It seems that the Twelve Nobles have decided to not pursue their crimes.
...I see, thank goodness...
As with Elio and Theodore...we haven't received any updates so far...
... Naya, do you remember the time you said that you feel like I am a changed person?
... I thought you'd reached a point where what I said didn't mean much to you anymore.
... I want to tell you a secret...
That day, in the desert, there was this voice in my head...
It told me to order you to shoot the arrow. It didn't matter if you had killed Elio; I had to get rid of Theodore, once and for all...
In the end, I was able to suppress that voice, I was terrified. I would never even consider something like that in the past...
It seems like there's a part of me that I'm gradually not able to recognize...
To be honest...I was originally a bit mad at you too...I was mad that even you misunderstood me.
But now...I think that you might be right.
...Angel...
I'm so scared. Naya, what...what should I do?
